title: How much money does a rock band make? - Quora

response.answer_text: According to the “Inside Hook” article, the buskers can expect to make $50 to $100 a day. Elite musicians, who get work as sessions players, can earn between $100 and $2,500 daily. (Session players with a gift for mimicry can also earn up to $2,500 as a cover band.) New bands working the festival circuit earn between $3,000 and $7,500 per fest.
Bands actually make little money from record sales. Their main cash flow comes from live performances and tours.
